Name: Matthis
Role: Guild Master of the Death Guild → Striga (Incubus)
Description: Sole operator and founder-in-practice of the Death Guild after the mining disaster. Former miner turned custodian of wizard dead. Responsible for containment
column5: and final destruction of undead remains. Quiet
column7: and deeply burdened by moral responsibility. Accidentally fed on a dying wizard and became something parasitic and unnatural. Exercises influence rather than command
column8: fearing domination and loss of self. His authority grows through results

Name: Bartholomew
Description: A seasoned earth-magic wizard retained by the mine. Wry
column6: he treats horror as routine. Assists with corpse handling and undead containment when required. Alternates between mocking and respecting Matthis
column7: unsettled by his effectiveness and restraint.

Name: Elspeth
Description: Works the kitchen at the Staff and Flagon public house. Warm
column5: and quietly resilient. Possesses innate witchcraft that unconsciously enchants food—meals that restore strength
column7: and fortify resolve. Sees through Matthis’ tension immediately and offers support without interrogation. Her presence lightens scenes and introduces hope without sentimentality.

Name: Godric
column4: practical miner with seniority but no formal authority. Deeply shaped by the cave-in and its aftermath. Participates in Death Guild rites out of grim necessity. Skeptical of magic yet dependent on it. Represents the working class perspective: survival first

Name: Nell
Role: Barmaid at the Staff and Flagon
column4: common barmaid marked by grief. Known for kindness and attentiveness
column5: which drew the affection of a newly arrived wizard. Her loss provides an intimate
column6: human cost to magical ambition and reinforces the town’s quiet desperation.

Name: Liora
Description: A frightened child whose uncontrolled magic manifests destructively. Her condition forces Matthis to confront the ethics of intervention
column6: untrained power without intent or malice.

Name: Corven
Role: Death Guild clerk and former administrator
Description: A minor bureaucratic holdover from before the disaster. Nervous
column5: and deeply uncomfortable with Matthis’ autonomy and methods. Functions as a background voice of institutional anxiety rather than true authority.

Name: Harlan Vetch
Description: Owner and chief operator of Coalridge Pit. Shrewd
column5: and exceptionally skilled at mining logistics. Cares deeply about keeping production steady and death tolls low
column6: but has no interest in causes
column8: or moral reckoning. Will fund any solution that works and asks no questions as long as the mine stays open.
